PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05062017-05-12,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActCriminal Code
SubjectOrder Declaring an Amnesty Period (2017)
PrecisOrder Declaring an AMNESTY PERIOD (2017) in order to extend the Amnesty Order, until December 31, 2017, in order to encourage compliance with the licensing provisions of the Firearms Act and the Criminal Code prior to its expiration.
